beginner.name: Jump Rope
beginner.instructions: Jump continuously at a steady pace for 1 minute. Rest 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

beginner.name: Bodyweight Squats
beginner.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower into a squat and return. Do 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Plank
beginner.instructions: Hold a forearm plank for 30 seconds. Rest 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

beginner.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
beginner.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench, squat down on front leg. 3 sets of 10 reps each leg.

beginner.name: Leg Press
beginner.instructions: Push the platform with your legs. Do 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Wall Sits
beginner.instructions: Hold a squat position against a wall for 30-60 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

beginner.name: Russian Twists
beginner.instructions: Sit, lean back, twist torso side to side with or without weight. 3 sets of 20 reps.

beginner.name: Leg Raises
beginner.instructions: Lie down and lift legs up to 90°. Lower without touching ground. 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Bicycle Crunches
beginner.instructions: Lie back, alternate elbow to opposite knee. 3 sets of 20 reps.

beginner.name: Incline Push-ups
beginner.instructions: Push up with hands on a bench. 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Chest Dips
beginner.instructions: Lower and raise your body on dip bars. 3 sets of 10 reps.

beginner.name: Incline Bench Press
beginner.instructions: Press bar from upper chest. 3 sets of 8 reps.

beginner.name: Lat Pulldown
beginner.instructions: Pull bar to upper chest. 3 sets of 10 reps.

beginner.name: Reverse Flys
beginner.instructions: Bend over, raise dumbbells sideways. 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Superman Exercise
beginner.instructions: Lie face down and raise arms and legs. Hold 5s, repeat 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Lateral Raises
beginner.instructions: Raise dumbbells to the sides. 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Front Raises
beginner.instructions: Lift dumbbells in front to shoulder height. 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Arnold Press
beginner.instructions: Rotate dumbbells as you press overhead. 3 sets of 10 reps.

beginner.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
beginner.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench, squat down on front leg. 3 sets of 10 reps each leg.

beginner.name: Leg Press
beginner.instructions: Push the platform with your legs. Do 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Wall Sits
beginner.instructions: Hold a squat position against a wall for 30-60 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

beginner.name: Russian Twists
beginner.instructions: Sit, lean back, twist torso side to side with or without weight. 3 sets of 20 reps.

beginner.name: Leg Raises
beginner.instructions: Lie down and lift legs up to 90°. Lower without touching ground. 3 sets of 15 reps.

beginner.name: Bicycle Crunches
beginner.instructions: Lie back, alternate elbow to opposite knee. 3 sets of 20 reps.

beginner.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
beginner.instructions: Lie on an incline bench and press dumbbells upward. 3 sets of 10 reps.

beginner.name: Chest Fly
beginner.instructions: Use dumbbells or a machine to perform flys. 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Push-up to Shoulder Tap
beginner.instructions: Perform a push-up, then tap each shoulder. 3 sets of 10 reps.

beginner.name: Lat Pulldown
beginner.instructions: Pull the bar down to your chest. 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Dumbbell Rows
beginner.instructions: Row dumbbell toward waist. 3 sets of 10 reps per arm.

beginner.name: Superman Exercise
beginner.instructions: Lie face down and lift arms and legs. Hold for 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

beginner.name: Lateral Raises
beginner.instructions: Raise dumbbells to sides until shoulder level. 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Front Raises
beginner.instructions: Lift dumbbells in front to shoulder level. 3 sets of 12 reps.

beginner.name: Arnold Press
beginner.instructions: Rotate dumbbells from front to overhead press. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Burpees
intermediate.instructions: Perform 10 burpees per set. Rest 30 seconds. Complete 3 sets.

intermediate.name: Kettlebell Swings
intermediate.instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs to shoulder height. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Jump Lunges
intermediate.instructions: Alternate legs while jumping. 3 sets of 10 reps per leg.

advanced.name: HIIT Sprints
advanced.instructions: Sprint 30s, rest 30s, repeat for 20 minutes.

advanced.name: Battle Ropes
advanced.instructions: Alternate arms for 30s, rest 30s. Repeat for 5 rounds.

advanced.instructions: Jump onto a stable box. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
intermediate.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench, squat down on front leg. 3 sets of 10 reps each leg.

intermediate.name: Leg Press
intermediate.instructions: Push the platform with your legs. Do 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Wall Sits
intermediate.instructions: Hold a squat position against a wall for 30-60 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

intermediate.name: Russian Twists
intermediate.instructions: Sit, lean back, twist torso side to side with or without weight. 3 sets of 20 reps.

intermediate.name: Leg Raises
intermediate.instructions: Lie down and lift legs up to 90°. Lower without touching ground. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Bicycle Crunches
intermediate.instructions: Lie back, alternate elbow to opposite knee. 3 sets of 20 reps.

intermediate.name: Incline Push-ups
intermediate.instructions: Push up with hands on a bench. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Chest Dips
intermediate.instructions: Lower and raise your body on dip bars. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Incline Bench Press
intermediate.instructions: Press bar from upper chest. 3 sets of 8 reps.

intermediate.name: Lat Pulldown
intermediate.instructions: Pull bar to upper chest. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Reverse Flys
intermediate.instructions: Bend over, raise dumbbells sideways. 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Superman Exercise
intermediate.instructions: Lie face down and raise arms and legs. Hold 5s, repeat 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Lateral Raises
intermediate.instructions: Raise dumbbells to the sides. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Front Raises
intermediate.instructions: Lift dumbbells in front to shoulder height. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Arnold Press
intermediate.instructions: Rotate dumbbells as you press overhead. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
intermediate.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench, squat down on front leg. 3 sets of 10 reps each leg.

intermediate.name: Leg Press
intermediate.instructions: Push the platform with your legs. Do 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Wall Sits
intermediate.instructions: Hold a squat position against a wall for 30-60 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

intermediate.name: Russian Twists
intermediate.instructions: Sit, lean back, twist torso side to side with or without weight. 3 sets of 20 reps.

intermediate.name: Leg Raises
intermediate.instructions: Lie down and lift legs up to 90°. Lower without touching ground. 3 sets of 15 reps.

intermediate.name: Bicycle Crunches
intermediate.instructions: Lie back, alternate elbow to opposite knee. 3 sets of 20 reps.

intermediate.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
intermediate.instructions: Lie on an incline bench and press dumbbells upward. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Chest Fly
intermediate.instructions: Use dumbbells or a machine to perform flys. 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Push-up to Shoulder Tap
intermediate.instructions: Perform a push-up, then tap each shoulder. 3 sets of 10 reps.

intermediate.name: Lat Pulldown
intermediate.instructions: Pull the bar down to your chest. 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Dumbbell Rows
intermediate.instructions: Row dumbbell toward waist. 3 sets of 10 reps per arm.

intermediate.name: Superman Exercise
intermediate.instructions: Lie face down and lift arms and legs. Hold for 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

intermediate.name: Lateral Raises
intermediate.instructions: Raise dumbbells to sides until shoulder level. 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Front Raises
intermediate.instructions: Lift dumbbells in front to shoulder level. 3 sets of 12 reps.

intermediate.name: Arnold Press
intermediate.instructions: Rotate dumbbells from front to overhead press. 3 sets of 10 reps.

advanced.name: Stair Sprints
advanced.instructions: Sprint up stairs for 20s, walk down. Repeat for 10 rounds.

advanced.name: CrossFit Circuit
advanced.instructions: Do a 20-minute AMRAP of burpees, squats, and sit-ups.

advanced.name: Trail Running
advanced.instructions: Run on trail terrain for 45 minutes.
